articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China’s Xi Jinping arrives in Cambodia to wrap up 3-nation Southeast Asia tour - NPR
articles.description: The visit, Xi's first since 2016, will conclude a three-nation Southeast Asian tour that included stops in Vietnam and Malaysia.
articles.content:
PHNOM PENH, Cambodia Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in Cambodia on Thursday for a two-day state visit that serves as an opportunity to further strengthen already robust relations.
